document.title: Adult Education in Germany. Roots, Status, Mainstreams, Changes.

disciplines.discipline: Adult and Continuing Education and Teaching
Social and Philosophical Foundations of Education

document.abstract: This paper summarizes the historical roots and developments of adult education (practical field) and andragogy (academic discipline) in Germany and offers it to comparison with the readers national situation.
